column4: Hey peeps, I'm an experienced windows user who is running my first ubuntu machine. and I've got a problem
When I run youtube videos in FF, the program hangs.
The same things happens in epiphany
I've installed all the flash plugins for FF, but it still happens.
I haven't been prompted to install plugins for epiphany, and the flash did load, it just made the prog hang
Drowned: Showave Flash 9.0.r999 and same gnash
you can only have 1 plugin installed at a time
if you have nonfree flash installed then you can't have nash installed
I don't know what to say, I'm looking in the Add-ons window --> plugins, and that's what I read, 2 entries.
oh i understand sunny
goto synaptics
k
what am I looking for?
now just type gnash into the quick search
i assume its installed with a green box next to its name
yes, I've got gnash, gnash-common, and mozilla-plugin-gnash
ok click the main gnash one and say mark for removal
it should also remove the other ones you mentioned then
It didn't mark gnash-common
but the other 2 are now marked for removal
ok now search nonfree
it should pull up the flash one
ok, removed
